name: Click Olympics
description:
CLICK OLYMPICS is inspired by sites such as clickspeedtest.com (and others).
The goal is simple - Get the most clicks in the selected time limit!

CLICK OLYMPICS tracks your high scores for each time limit, as well as your highest CPS (Clicks Per Second), average CPS and all-time click total.

A unique feature of CLICK OLYMPICS is the Personal Record Bar, or "PR Bar" for short, which visually shows you how close you are to beating your personal record during gameplay.

So, how fast can you click?!

Check out the leaderboard Here.

 Special thanks to RPGMZ plugin creators:
- SRDude
- Visustella Team
- Chaucer

Stadium backdrop downloaded & licensed from Shutterstock.
Sound effects licensed from MixKit.
